title: To Do App
description: This was my second application. It was more complex and used React features like useReducer, making it a great challenge. This project deepened my understanding of state management in React.

title: Gif Expert
description: This is my first application. Understanding fetch was challenging, but I mastered it by creating a custom hook. This project greatly improved my data fetching skills

title: Weather App
description: This is the latest application I've built. I aimed for simplicity, so I implemented everything in a single component, making it straightforward to develop. I plan to enhance the visuals in the future.

title: PlanIt
description: Collaborated in a team of 4 to develop a web application for backpackers,simplifying trip planning with tripmates using Ruby on Rails, APIs, Pundit forauthentication, and deployed on Heroku.
